fr.upmc.datacenter.software.informations.requestdispatcher

Class RequestDispatcherComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.informations.requestdispatcher.RequestDispatcherComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, PushModeControllingI, RequestNotificationHandlerI, RequestSubmissionHandlerI, RequestResourceVMHandlerI

    public class RequestDispatcherComponent
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
implements RequestSubmissionHandlerI, RequestNotificationHandlerI, RequestResourceVMHandlerI, PushModeControllingI
    Version:
    28.12.17.HK The RequestDispatcherComponent references of a new AVM reference affected to him, receives request providing from RequestGenerator and dispatch the request using a round-robin policy to current list of ApplicationVMAdaptable This component is subscribed to a Push service which allows to send DataI to all clients, in our case the data will be received by AdapterComponent start the pushing of data and force the pushing to be done each interval period of time.
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
